div.p: THE BEST I CAN DO IS
TAKE OVER, MR. SULU. I'LL BE
GRAB AHOLD OF AND BRING IN.

p.span: THAT OURS ARE THE ONLY TWO

div.p: OF THE CREW OF THIS SHIP.
IT WAS HIS ORDER THAT IT BE
HE WAS A HERO IN EVERY
AT THE RISK OF HIS OWN LIFE

p.span: AND BOTH OF YOU ARE LOCKED
AND IF YOU FIND IT SOUND,
YOU MIGHT FIND THAT HE IS

div.p: AND YOU COULD HIT A MAN
YES, SIR. THE SHIP CAN DRIVE
HAS THROWN US CLEAR OF IT.
WELL, I HOPE WE WON'T HAVE
